titleInfo.title: Radio schedule, and Plans to promote the CBC/St. Agnes building campaign

mods.abstract: Christian Brothers College prepared a radio schedule for Memphis radio stations WMC, WREC, WMPS, and WHBQ to promote the building campaign for the new buildings--the Administration Building at CBC and St. Agnes Academy. Spots ran during April and May in 1950.
